meanings.definition: In a way that provides nourishment and sustenance.
meanings.sent1: She ate the apple slices nutritiously, ensuring she got all the vitamins and minerals.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared the salad nutritiously, using fresh ingredients and a light dressing.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored the nuts nutritiously in its burrow, ready for the winter ahead.
meanings.sent4: The garden was watered so nutritiously that the plants thrived in the rich soil.
meanings.sent5: The athlete fueled her body so nutritiously that she had the energy to run a marathon.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is beneficial to one's health and well-being.
meanings.sent1: He exercised regularly and ate nutritiously to maintain his health.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised her patient to eat nutritiously and get enough rest to recover quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cat groomed itself so nutritiously that its fur was always shiny and soft.
meanings.sent4: The students studied so nutritiously that they aced their exams with ease.
meanings.sent5: The spa offered treatments that nourished the skin so nutritiously that customers left glowing.
